name: No Man Is An Island (Andrea Hayes)
name_original: No Man Is An Island (Andrea Hayes)
description:
No Man Is An Island is a game about a man stranded on a desert island, who goes through the seven stages of grief, and crafts items to survive. This is a walking simulator / point and click video game that was created for the SA Game Jam in 2019. 

This game was created by Benjamin Crooks, James Gibson, Sunny Woolls and Andrea Hayes.
